list.title: CDM
list.subTitle: Anomaly Detect
list.content: Identify, analyze, review and collaborate to eliminate anomalies in clinical data using Advanced Analytics , AI/ ML with active learning engine to expedite clinical data management and data review

list.title: Auto Map
list.subTitle: (SDTM)
list.content: Automate study transformation from raw (EDC) to SDTM format using ML with active learning engine

list.title: Fine Grained Security Access controller
list.content: Evaluates the user credentials and uses the complete set of permissions to determine how to handle the fine grained access request.

list.title: Medical Imaging
list.content: Acquire, de-identify PHI and process images to analyze patient reports using ML

list.title: Auto Map
list.subTitle: (OMOP)
list.content: Automate transformation of OMOP to SDTM or SDTM to OMOP standard

list.title: Query Manager
list.content: Enable management of queries, comments across all trial source data

list.title: Data Catalog Search using NLP
list.content: Expedite clinical data search using NLP

list.title: Data Lineage & Traceability
list.subTitle: (Using graph DB)
list.content: Represent clinical data as a graph displaying the full, interconnected history of each data element

list.title: Auto Medical Coder
list.subTitle: (AE and ConMed PTs)
list.content: Automate the medical coding using Machine Learning and feedback loop

list.title: Validated R and Python Packages
list.content: Validate R & Python open-source packages to mitigate the risk of using these open sources in regulated field.

list.title: Auto Map (ADaM)
list.content: Automate study transformation from SDTM to  ADaM format using Machine Learning with an active learning engine

list.title: Medical Data Review Reports
list.content: Enable clinical data review with advanced statistical reports and collaborative workflow

list.title: Anomaly Reports
list.content: Provide advanced visualization reports to showcase data anomalies

list.title: Patient Narrative
list.subTitle: using NLP
list.content: Expedite process of patient profile or patient narrative creation using NLP

list.title: Data Management Operational Reports
list.content: Operational Report - Query Management Report (Time to Open, Answer, Close query), Page Status report , Missing pages report
